verses.text_plain: Hear this word that the Lord hath spoken against you, O children of Israel, against the whole family which I brought up from the land of Egypt, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1Hear this word that the Lord hath spoken against you, O children of Israel, against the whole family which I brought up from the land of Egypt, saying,

verses.text_plain: You only have I known of all the families of the earth: therefore I will punish you for all your iniquities.
verses.verse_html:
2You only have I known of all the families of the earth: therefore I will punish you for all your iniquities. ▼
▼ punish: Heb. visit upon

footnotes.body_html: ▼ punish: Heb. visit upon

verses.text_plain: Can two walk together, except they be agreed?
verses.verse_html: 3Can two walk together, except they be agreed?

verses.text_plain: Will a lion roar in the forest, when he hath no prey? will a young lion cry out of his den, if he have taken nothing?
verses.verse_html:
4Will a lion roar in the forest, when he hath no prey? will a young lion cry out of his den, if he have taken nothing? ▼
▼ cry: Heb. give forth his voice

footnotes.body_text: ▼ cry: Heb. give forth his voice
footnotes.body_html: ▼ cry: Heb. give forth his voice

verses.text_plain: Can a bird fall in a snare upon the earth, where no gin is for him? shall one take up a snare from the earth, and have taken nothing at all?
verses.verse_html: 5Can a bird fall in a snare upon the earth, where no gin is for him? shall one take up a snare from the earth, and have taken nothing at all?

verses.text_plain: Shall a trumpet be blown in the city, and the people not be afraid? shall there be evil in a city, and the Lord hath not done it?
verses.verse_html:
6Shall a trumpet be blown in the city, and the people not be afraid? shall there be evil in a city, and the Lord hath not done it? ▼
▼ be afraid: or, run together?
 , ▼
▼ the Lord…: or, shall not the Lord do somewhat?

footnotes.body_html: ▼ be afraid: or, run together?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the Lord…: or, shall not the Lord do somewhat?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the Lord…: or, shall not the Lord do somewhat?

verses.text_plain: Surely the Lord God will do nothing, but he revealeth his secret unto his servants the prophets.
verses.verse_html: 7Surely the Lord God will do nothing, but he revealeth his secret unto his servants the prophets.

verses.text_plain: The lion hath roared, who will not fear? the Lord God hath spoken, who can but prophesy?
verses.verse_html: 8The lion hath roared, who will not fear? the Lord God hath spoken, who can but prophesy?

verses.text_plain: Publish in the palaces at Ashdod, and in the palaces in the land of Egypt, and say, Assemble yourselves upon the mountains of Samaria, and behold the great tumults in the midst thereof, and the oppressed in the midst thereof.
verses.verse_html:
9Publish in the palaces at Ashdod, and in the palaces in the land of Egypt, and say, Assemble yourselves upon the mountains of Samaria, and behold the great tumults in the midst thereof, and the oppressed in the midst thereof. ▼
▼ oppressed: or, oppressions

verses.text_plain: For they know not to do right, saith the Lord, who store up violence and robbery in their palaces.
verses.verse_html:
10For they know not to do right, saith the Lord, who store up violence and robbery in their palaces. ▼
▼ robbery: or, spoil

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; An adversary there shall be even round about the land; and he shall bring down thy strength from thee, and thy palaces shall be spoiled.
verses.verse_html: 11Therefore thus saith the Lord God; An adversary there shall be even round about the land; and he shall bring down thy strength from thee, and thy palaces shall be spoiled.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; As the shepherd taketh out of the mouth of the lion two legs, or a piece of an ear; so shall the children of Israel be taken out that dwell in Samaria in the corner of a bed, and in Damascus in a couch.
verses.verse_html:
12Thus saith the Lord; As the shepherd taketh out of the mouth of the lion two legs, or a piece of an ear; so shall the children of Israel be taken out that dwell in Samaria in the corner of a bed, and in Damascus in a couch. ▼
▼ taketh: Heb. delivereth
 , ▼
▼ in Damascus…: or, on the bed’s feet

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in Damascus…: or, on the bed’s feet
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in Damascus…: or, on the bed’s feet

verses.text_plain: Hear ye, and testify in the house of Jacob, saith the Lord God, the God of hosts,
verses.verse_html: 13Hear ye, and testify in the house of Jacob, saith the Lord God, the God of hosts,

verses.text_plain: That in the day that I shall visit the transgressions of Israel upon him I will also visit the altars of Beth–el: and the horns of the altar shall be cut off, and fall to the ground.
verses.verse_html:
14That in the day that I shall visit the transgressions of Israel upon him I will also visit the altars of Beth–el: and the horns of the altar shall be cut off, and fall to the ground. ▼
▼ visit: or, punish Israel for

tokens.text: upon him I will also visit

footnotes.body_html: ▼ visit: or, punish Israel for

verses.text_plain: And I will smite the winter house with the summer house; and the houses of ivory shall perish, and the great houses shall have an end, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15And I will smite the winter house with the summer house; and the houses of ivory shall perish, and the great houses shall have an end, saith the Lord.
